  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2200</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2200</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com puc descriure una història en passat?</string>
            <string language="en">How can I tell a story in the past?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie kann ich eine Geschichte in der Vergangenheit
erklären?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment est-ce que je peux dire une histoire dans
le passé ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como posso eu dizer uma história no passado?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come posso dire ad una storia nel passato?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς μπορώ να πω μια ιστορία στο παρελθόν;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva que treballa la descripció d'una història en anglès fent servir els temps passat, en particular el Past Continuous. Conté enllaços per ampliar-ne la informació.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on telling a story in English using past tenses, especially the Past Continuous. It includes links for further information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) auf 
dem Erklären einer Geschichte in der englischen verwendenden 
Vergangenheit, besonders die Vergangenheit ununterbrochen. Sie 
schließt Links für weitere Informationen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur dire une
histoire aux passés d'utilisation anglais, particulièrement le 
passé continu. Il inclut des liens pour de plus amples 
informations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em dizer uma 
história em tempos passados usando-se ingleses, especial o passado 
contínuo. Inclui as ligações para uma informação mais 
adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sul dire ad 
una storia nei passati usando inglesi, particolarmente l'esperienza 
continua. Include i collegamenti per ulteriori informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στην 
αφήγηση μιας ιστορίας στα αγγλικά που χρησιμοποιούν τους 
αορίστους, ιδιαίτερα προηγούμενος ο συνεχής. Περιλαμβάνει 
τις συνδέσεις για περισσότερες πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
